Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 1 Understand the Goal The objective is to create a Petri net PN model representing a specific insurance claim management process using the pm4py library The PN must be an accepting Petri net PN plus initial marking final marking It needs specific nodes places and transitions connections arcs logic linear flow plus loops and proper markings

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 2 Analyze the Scenario Root Cause Customer files Insurance Claim C Linear Flow 1 Claim Registration CR 2 Document Verification DV 3 Fraud Check FC 4 Claim Assessment CA 5 Approval AP 6 Payment P 7 Notification N 8 Closure CL Non-linear Branching Logic Loops From DV if incomplete RDS back to DV From FC if doubts II back to FC can repeat End State After P N and CL

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 3 Design the Petri Net Structure Transitions t_cr Claim Registration t_dv Document Verification t_rds Re-Document Submission t_fc Fraud Check t_ii In-depth Investigation t_ca Claim Assessment t_ap Approval t_p Payment t_n Notification t_cl Closure Places p_start Insurance Claim filed p_cr after CR before DV p_dv after DV before FC or RDS p_fc after FC before CA p_ca after CA p_ap after AP p_p after P p_n after N p_cl after CL p_end Markings im p_start 1 fm p_end 1

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: 4 Refining the Logic for the Code Step 1 Define Net net PetriNet insurance_claim_net Step 2 Define Nodes p_start p_cr p_dv p_rds p_fc p_ii p_ca p_ap p_p p_n p_cl p_end t_cr t_dv t_rds t_fc t_ii t_ca t_ap t_p t_n t_cl Step 3 Define Markings im Marking p_start 1 fm Marking p_end 1 Step 4 Add Nodes to Net Step 5 Add Arcs 1 Start CR 2 CR DV 3 DV FC 4 DV RDS 5 RDS DV 6 FC CA 7 FC II 8 II FC 9 CA AP 10 AP P 11 P N 12 N CL 13 CL End

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: 5 Drafting the Python Code Mental Check code snippet with places p_start p_after_cr p_after_dv p_after_rds p_after_fc p_after_ii etc transitions t_cr label Claim Registration etc add nodes add arcs like p_start t_cr t_cr p_after_cr p_after_cr t_dv etc p_dv t_fc t_fc p_fc p_dv t_rds t_rds p_dv p_fc t_ca t_ca p_ca p_fc t_ii t_ii p_fc etc markings im p_start 1 fm p_end 1

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 6 Refining Requirements Check Accepting Petri Net Yes Places representing states between activities Yes Transitions labeled with activity names Yes Arcs forming logical sequence with loops Yes Initial marking start place Yes Final marking closed claim Yes Code using pm4py objects petri_net obj PetriNet Marking petri_utils Yes

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: 7 Final Code Assembly Self-Correction Edge Case Check prompt construction destruction example basic transitions stick to basic Insurance Claim C place trigger start place yes refine place names p_cr state between CR and DV etc loop logic p_dv t_rds p_dv p_fc t_ii p_fc looks solid

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: 8 Output Generation code block with final refinements error in arc from p_cl to t_end_placeholder not defined correction need transition after CL to p_end add t_finalize PetriNet Transition name End Action label Finish refine transitions and places list p_start p_cr p_dv p_fc etc t_cr t_dv etc t_finalize covers everything
